document.masterDocTitle: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

subSubSection.paragraph:
Species:
Bathyglycinde profunda (Hartman & Fauchald 1971 )
References: Amaral & Rossi-Wongtschowski ( 2004 ) Environment: Continental slope
Environment: Bay, coastal lagoon, mangrove, creek, tidal flat, middle continental shelf

et al. ( 2009 ), Almeida et al. ( 2012 ) as
Goniada littorea
Environment: Bay, coastal lagoon, inner continental shelf, continental slope
Environment: Bay, inner continental shelf, continental slope

Species:
Goniadella revizee Rizzo & Amaral 2004
References: Amaral & Rossi-Wongtschowski ( 2004 ) Environment: Continental slope

Species:
Goniadides carolinae Day 1973
